TopicTitle: Silvester Industries (09/03/2013)Truck and magic box Update

Articles.Content:
so, here i present

A truck and a magix box that can transform into a fuel tank for planetary base, this is just version 1 and I help to calculate how many fuel quantity for the part

here is the actual pic

Truck and fuel tank

the model is from dexsoft

Truck : Download Here

fuel tank : Download Here

wip for more transforming boxes

Silvester Industries Pack

link : Download Here

need sugestions

Edited September 3, 2013 by Silvester
Does the tank consume electricity to produce the glow? is it automatic?
Now we need engines that sound like a Recognizer.

Does the tank consume electricity to produce the glow? is it automatic?

- it does consume electricity 0.01 rate (1/4 from stock spotlight )

- can be toogle by light key [ U ]
Nice!! Now do more parts in that style

Well the style looks good, also it doesnt look similar to other mods.. soo i guess, like eurybaric said, if you could start making more parts of the same theme like maybe batteries/stacked RTGs, propulsion stuffs, controllable things Unmanned Pod/SAS-ReactionWheels etc, i think we got a winner pack right here
Could you make it look more kerbal? j/k! Neat idea btw.
Let me know if you are looking for some texture work, that is if you are looking to do some for somebody

Silvester... in german that would be... new year's eve? German is my 3rd language, so I'm not that good at it. Danish being my first and english my second.

On topic: The tank looks awesome. I might have to delete a few parts, so that I can use this.
Awesome, I was looking for sci-fi/tron style stuff.

thank you guys, your nice comment really mean a lot to me , a nice moral suport for next release

so i guess next target is adapter, decoupler , batt and rgts

what do you think about sleave type extension tank? (hose like tank that warp the original tank ) for ex batteries or kethane or any another type

and what about glow color?

ps: i'm not german , by chance sylvester stallone movie Rambo gets hits when i'm about to be born
Kethane would obviously be the same, but green instead of blue. Maybe blue could be an oxidizer-only tank, red a fuel-only tank, and orange the current LFO tank? A battery should have yellow lines.

ok, i'll take that into consideration, thanks

Anybody Up for Arc Reactor rgt? look at first post

that looks awesome! looking forwards to more. I do have a request though...

I'm a fan of the Forerunners in Halo, who usually have EVERYTHING glowy in some way shape or form.... think it would be possible to do a "Forerunner" skin, IE all right angles and orangish glow?

in case you were wondering what I meant, take a look at a Suppressor http://halo.wikia.com/wiki/Z-130_Directed_Energy_Automatic_Weapon

that looks awesome! looking forwards to more. I do have a request though...

kerbal can't get in after get out .....

Do you have something obstructing your hatch or is your hatch green arrow facing the wrong way maybe? If you can get out that's a good sign. If you can't get in, ie you are stepping into the hatch zone and still no "F: Board" option comes up, just move your hatch out some more from the side of the cart.
